00113 void eqDb::updateHour(string year, string month, string day, string hour)
00114 {
00115         string query = "update startdates set successful=1 where startdate=\\'" ;
00116         string concat_dateTime = year + "-" + month + "-" + day + " " + hour + ":00:00";
